title: Help!
content:
Currently I am studying in 2 nd sem  B.tech(CSE)...what are the consequences i have to face if I want to drop now..? Or take transfer to other college after 2 nd sem.
Will they ask me to pay whole fee of b.tech? Or will they demand more money for no objection certificate..? Or what are the possible  consequences?

comments.body: Relax, they won't keep you hostage. As far as I remember they do try to extract a pretty hefty fine from you for wasting a seat (depends on what kind of seat you have). There are some old posts on this subreddit you can check out.
